content: > this pattern is available for ** free on > my blog 1 ** the downloadable pdf > listed here for sale contains the full > pattern including crochet charts in one printable file without advertisements join the **pattern paradise crochet community fb group** 2 to crochet along with us this shawl is a beautiful triangle shawl made with basic crochet stitches that combine to create lace filet crochet and scalloped sections and border it is the perfect accessory to be worn as a traditional shawl wrap scarf or fashion piece **the grey ombre shawl was made with custom dyed yarn by **kt & the squid** 6 be sure to visit her shop to see all her beautiful yarns ** size as shown approximately 54 x 26 worked in #3 dk weight yarn my patterns are written in standard american terms and include pictures stitch guides and explanations as necessary to make them easy to follow please share your finished projects on our facebook page and join us for info coupon codes and giveaways ** www facebook com/patternparadise 7 ** follow my blog ** www pattern-paradise com 8 ** text and images c the pattern paradise all rights reserved 1 https //wp me/p4vx0z-48z 2 https //www facebook com/groups/patternparadisecrochetcommunity/ 3 https //wp me/p4vx0z-4b8 4 https //wp me/p4vx0z-4c5 5 https //wp me/p4vx0z-4cv 6 https //www etsy com/shop/ktandthesquid ref=search_shop_redirect&source=aw&utm_source=affiliate_window&utm_medium=affiliate&utm_campaign=us_location_buyer&awc=6220_1520220434_ec5fa3ed71594b41f05b895eb9ee81a4&utm_content=409953 7 https //facebook com/patternparadise 8 https //pattern-paradise com
